original_text: I was afraid of the trouble that God might bring to me. So I could not do these bad things, because God is so great and powerful. I was afraid of the trouble that God might bring to me. So I could not do these bad things, because God is so great and powerful. I was afraid of the trouble that God might bring to me.
korean_text: 나는 하나님의 재앙을 심히 두려워하고 그의 위엄으로 말미암아 그런 일을 할 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: I was afraid of the trouble
that God might bring to me
So I could not do these bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 이 악한 일들을 할 수 없었다
